column7: Study of technical and clinical aspects of electrophysiologic measures of audition; critical analysis of clinical and experimental literature; laboratory experience in electrophysiologic techniques. 4 or 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: SHS 550 or consent of instructor.
column9: 4 or 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: SHS 550 or consent of instructor.
